name: Butternut Squash Soup II
author: Maplebird
summary: This is a thick, rich soup with tons of flavor. Something I whipped up off the top of my head, with things I had on hand. Super easy, quick, and a great way to use squash. An instant hit at my house.
ingredients: 1 medium butternut squash - peeled, seeded, and cubed
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
directions: Melt the butter in a large pot, and cook the onion, celery, carrot, potatoes, and squash 5 minutes, or until lightly browned
Pour in enough of the chicken stock to cover vegetables
Reduce heat to low, cover pot, and simmer 40 minutes, or until all vegetables are tender
Transfer the soup to a blender, and blend until smooth
Return to pot, and mix in any remaining stock to attain desired consistency
